fields.name: Sell, Sell, Sell (LOCKED):
fields.value: You unlock this ability when you have at least 1 Stock in your inventory. Otherwise, it is locked. Target a player. They have a chance to buy your item. Their chance is the score they received on their response during the evening. If it fails, you keep the Stock.

fields.name: Loyalist (Passive):
fields.value: Anyone you sell Stock to cannot target you for any Harmful actions.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to sell 4 of your stock to Townies throughout the game.
